titles.title: Bona Fide Beef Branding Act of 2022
Bona Fide Beef Branding Act of 2022
A bill to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to promulgate regulations modifying labeling requirements for beef and beef food products.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary:
Bona Fide Beef Branding Act of 2022
This bill revises labels for beef and beef food products. Specifically, the bill replaces the Product of U.S.A. label with the following voluntary labels: Processed in U.S.A.; Raised and Processed in U.S.A.; and Born, Raised, and Processed in U.S.A.
